oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Information regarding narrator’s family. In English after and in Bushman by /han≠kass’o (L VIII.
1. 6052 and 6053, 19. 7671, 26. 8302 rev.). Information about the younger brother of |han≠kass'o's grandfather Tsatsi, called !xein (or Dirk).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dirk (!xein, son of Dootje)
